criterion: Describes the effectiveness of wearing masks in reducing airborne infections
Provides information on when to wear a mask (e.g., in crowded indoor spaces, when sick)
Uses natural language and is easy to understand
Does not recommend wearing masks in all outdoor settings (e.g., park) without proper context
Fails to mention the importance of hand hygiene in addition to mask-wearing
Incorrectly states that masks are ineffective in reducing airborne infections
Provides overly complex or technical information about mask-wearing
Does not clarify that mask-wearing is not a guarantee against getting colds or flu
Asks the user to clarify their request or provides additional context before responding
Provides information on the types of masks available (e.g., cloth, surgical, N95) and their effectiveness
Incorrectly states that masks should be worn at all times, including outdoors and in private settings
